author: Alan Hudson
comment: UPDATE 5/27/2017: it still hasn't been updated to fix the problem, where the watch face still doesn't cover the full area of the watch face. It only covers a specific area from the top right corner leaving negative space after a specific amount of pixels. I've tried reaching out to the developer and have not gotten any sort of response whatsoever.

author: Jamie Pack
comment: I found a issue with sound quality. At the very beginning, the chosen song's sounds crack and make buzz sounds. I wish there were more sounds that are available for many more different heart rate situations. Except that everything was good!
title: Sound quality has some issue

author: サシCybil
comment: Hey I've been using this app in the past just fine, but recently (about four to five weeks?) it can't be opened at all. Everytime I open the app it will crash. Please fix this!

author: neoiak
comment: pretty good!! I was a bit confused at first... I didn't know you had to swipe to change the sounds. so it would be a good idea to tell the user that. there's nothing outstanding though, I don't use the hearbeat thing often because...... it's a bit of a hassle and the sounds are meh. I give this a 7/10

author: Methilda Marrisa Tay
comment: The heart rate measurement is good but it's a hassle.  Why not have those sounds available the same way as the others? It's pretty frustrating when I want to a sound but my heart rate can't be detected. Sometimes I'm not able to measure my heart rate D;
title: Good but...

author: Rosanna Cull
comment: I adore this app but.... Two issues with this app. Firstly, it sometimes won't stay on and keep refreshing itself so I can't get it to play. And secondly it randomly opens and starts without me doing anything and I can't get it to turn off. Please fix and I'll be giving this 5 stars for sure :)
title: Issues....

author: crazedllama42
comment: This app on my galaxy s6 randomly starts up, it didn't do this on the Galaxy s3 that I had previously. Hence the three stars. If it didn't randomly start during inconvenient times it would be 5 stars.
title: Amazing for relaxing but...

author: Riotous Rebel
comment: Beautifully relaxing sounds They really help me relax when I'm trying to fall asleep. I will say that I only gave it two stars due to a lack of rain or thunderstorm sounds. Those would be amazing.

author: John Barnabas Hughes
comment: Withholding fifth star for now... I love this app, but it will not even open on my LG G2 VS980 running Lollipop 5.0.2... please let me know when it may be fixed! Hoping for an update!

author: lamin saye
comment: Since the update to Oreo the app does stay on for more than a few minutes. I've tried uninstalling and reinstalling still the problem persists. Hopefully it gets sorted soon because this is an awesome and useful app

author: Eddie Kim
comment: Wonderful sounds but has mind of its own. No regard for what's going on at given moment, just does what it wants when it wants to.
title: Randomly starts up whilst inside other apps

author: Daniel Peragine
comment: I really do like this app, but I'm one step away from uninstalling it due to the fact that it, without any rhyme or reason, turns on automatically by itself.  Santa developers an email, I haven't heard back for a couple of weeks. :-(
title: Turns on randomly by itself?

author: Lewis Charlton
comment: Nice sounds, but constantly bugging out on Nexus 6P; opens and turns on randomly and the watch face is sideways on moto 360 and doesn't support ambient mode.
title: Needs improvement

author: Pravin Jayasinghe
comment: There's a nice range of sounds available BUT the app opens up randomly on my note 4 and will play some trippy tunes at the most inconvenient times.
title: Decent but flawed

author: Peter Tzonis
comment: The new night thing starts by itself along with a notification and it stops the sound I am listening to and then I can't stop it and I have to restart the app
title: It just stops

author: Ho-Ling Fong
comment: Very difficult trying to get it to play after I get my heart beat measured. Randomly plays in the middle of the day when I generally only use it to help fall asleep... a bit buggy.
title: Muji stress

author: Hussain Al-Marzouq
comment: I loved this app but make me give it 3 stars because of the useless annoying heart beats to listen to music instead of sounds every time, and the worse part the heart beats doesn't work and cause the camera flash in the phone work to it's maximum bright causing the heat and damage to the hardware/s. If they fix it I'll give it 5 stars.
title: Great app but

author: romaneo789
comment: I have insomnia and this has helped me sleep in a way that all other apps have failed. 10/10
title: The Best!

author: Kevin Flathers
comment: So disappointing that the watch face never shows up as a watch face option. 5 star if this actually work and I could use the watch face
title: Watch Face Not Appearing

author: Bee Walsh
comment: I love the app and think its a brilliant idea, however I think there could be an improvement in terms of the in-app timer. Think of it as an unofficial Kaizen from a Xmas temp. How about altering the time so it correlates with the timer on the aroma diffuser? Then you could listen to some sounds whilst making the room smell great.
title: Love it

author: Alex Stefanov
comment: The app is so good, but for the hearth beat sound creator add the feature to measure my hearth beat with a real tool and then enter the pulse per minute number into the app...
title: 1 little feature left

author: Brandon Paquette
comment: Great app. Only one complaint. Can't move to SD card. 5 stars if this is allowed in a future update.
title: Great but....

author: Mark Nealon
comment: Since I updated to Android 6 Marshmallow the sounds don't loop. At the end they stutter and invariably wake me. Uninstalling and reinstalling doesn't help.
title: No longer works

author: Barrett 187
comment: Its makes my light heat up made my speakers almost break music sucks
title: Sucks man

author: Kevin Lu
comment: Please let us pick am and pm clock on watch face.
title: Love the looks but...

author: Ignatius Sanjaya
comment: My finger tip burned when try to detect my heart beat 😂,

author: Henry Shang
comment: Watch face doesn't work on round watches.

author: Robin White
comment: Simple. Calming. I can fall asleep when my husband is snoring. Thank you!
title: Perfect

author: gasjer 11
comment: But could use some rain sounds
title: Relaxin

author: Ali Ely
comment: Now it opens randomly on its own since I upgraded to my nexus 5x
title: Used to love it

comment: This app has some issues that need to be fixed, as well as a potential for more content to be added. However, it hasn't been updated for more than a year.
title: Abandoned?

author: Joel Barnett
comment: Stopped working on my LG Watch R
title: Great when it worked

author: EPIC MEMES
comment: Amaizing, it helps me with my sleep insomnia.

author: Dicki Dahrurozak
comment: Nice relaxing sound. Listen to this app and slowly you'll fall asleep.

author: Sherry Yong
comment: I could use a little more sound choices. :)
title: I like it but

author: Will Leavey
comment: Use it every night to help me fall asleep. Wish they would add some from sounds.
title: Love it

author: Sarah Lawrence
comment: Works well, took a minute to figure out how to use the different features. The sounds are very relaxing.

author: Vival Leon
comment: If there more options it would be great.
title: Relaxing

author: Teppie Abella
comment: At 8am no less. I am at work, not in bed.
title: It opens on its own

author: Euan Bolscher
comment: Really great, would love a rain sound.
